```{r libraryverse, message=FALSE}
library (tidyverse)
```

## Problem 1

Load the penguins dataset.
```{r penquins}
data("penguins", package = "palmerpenguins")
penguins_df=
  tibble(
  summary.data.frame(penguins),
  ncol(penguins),
  nrow(penguins)
)

ggplot(penguins,aes (x=flipper_length_mm, y=bill_length_mm)) +
  geom_point()


ggsave("hw1_penguinsplot.pdf")

```
